basics.name: Nick Silverman
basics.label: Senior DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Senior DevOps Engineer with full and hybrid cloud operation and migration expperience. Expertise in designing and implementing platform architectures and all necessary infrastructure to support them. Enterprise production-level operation experience with SLA, DR, and 24/7 NOC requirements. Automation-conscious at every step, from developer commit to production running code. Always looking to improve process and infrastructure with DevOps ideologies in mind.

work.summary: Team leader, mentor, and primary architecture and technical resource for the organization including senior management. Oversaw and organized major platform changes and projects. Designed tooling for further internal automation.
highlights: Unified Puppet codebase so all platforms are configured and operate uniformly.
Authored and deployed internal Ruby web services for employee use and platform automation and monitoring.
Designed and organized architecture for all new platform features in collaboration with engineering teams.
Coordinated platform-wide improvements and planned maintenance with the organization and customers.
Created systems for improved internal platform stability and performance.
Built out the platform into new global regions in an effort to expand to global markets.
Developed and managed AWS and vendor business and technical relationships.

work.summary: Primary developer and maintainer of the production platforms. Designed and implemented a re-architecture of the platform infrastructure. Responsilble for 24/7 NOC and SLA level support.
highlights: Designed and implemented a multi-tenant architecture for the production platform that is cost efficient and scalable for any size customer.
Migrated legacy platform from on-prem solution to full-cloud solution.
Improved platform stability with near real-time monitoring solution and automated service-level management.
Designed multi-region DR remediation plans and processes to ensure fault tolerance.
Automated new tenant creation and created CI/CD for the product.
Maintained custom webserver and other application binaries, optimized for the production platform.
Converted infrastructure to Terraform code and designed drop-in modules for all future infrastructure.
Crafted incident response workflow and process for multi-tier support.

work.summary: Learned the platform architecture to grow into an individual contributor. Maintained the operation of the legacy platform and assisted in the implentation of a new platform for enterprise customers.
highlights: Implemented corporate Windows infrastructure via Active Directory and migrated from Open Directory.
Authored monintoring scripts for various aspects of the platform.
Designed and implemented automated external monitoring solution for internal and external customers.
Deployed new production platforms for onboarding clients.

work.summary: Provided Level Two support for all hardware and software. Managed multiple inventory and package management systems. Built and configured multiple Linux servers for internal support tools using Puppet.
First line of technical support for all HBG employees. Supported Microsoft Office, Adobe CS Suite, and many other internal sytems and applications on Mac and PC.
Sales leader in all metrics of the store. Provided technical and sales support for more advanced customers and specialists. Trained and mentored specialists and led store meetings.
Sales and support for all customers of the Apple Retail Store. Performed basic troubleshooting of iOS and Mac issues.
Provided phone support for iOS devices, iTunes, and Apple ID. Certified on iOS device hardware and software.
Technical Engineer for TEDx LitchfieldED conference. Audio/Visual support for 2012 Connecticut Student Innovation Expo. Maintained mobile iPod touch and Macbook labs.
Hardware, software, and peripheral support throughout campus, Mac and PC. Managed Cisco switches and other network devices.

volunteer.summary: Managed the digital library of music and media for the station. Organized purchase and distribution of digital content.
